description:
## Features
- Provides powerful remote control for all functions of the Behringer XAir digital mixing console
- Enables off-line editing/show preparation
- GUI closely emulates the XAir console allowing for operational training sessions when no console is available for hands-on experience
- Real-time level meters are shown for all audio channels, along with user-defined icons and names
- Edit several consoles on the same network from just one PC by starting several instances of XControl
- Executable files can be downloaded from behringer.com free of charge – no registration or installation procedure
- Windows XP, Vista, Windows7, Windows8 or Windows 10+, Mac OSX 10.6.8, 10.7 or 10.8, Linux tested with Ubuntu 12.04 with Wine

![screenshot](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ErythTV/Chocolatey_X-Air-Edit/Screenshot.PNG)
summary: Powerful software application for editing Behringer Digital Mixers via LAN/Wi-Fi.
author: Music Tribe Global Brands Ltd.
